algorithm_technique: Brute force iteration with digit product check
problem_summary_simple: Find the smallest number >= n whose digit product is divisible by t.
problem_summary_technical: Iteratively checks numbers starting from n, calculating digit product modulo t until the condition is met.
key_insights: The digit product can become 0 if any digit is 0, which is divisible by any t.
The constraints on n (<= 100) make a brute-force approach feasible.
